class.name: OpenXRMlMarkerUnderstandingManager
class.experimental: Marked as experimental due to lack of community validation on Magic Leap devices.
class.brief_description: Provides an easy-to-use way to interact with Magic Leap's Marker.
class.description: Provides an easy-to-use way to interact with Magic Leap's Marker. Markers are detected by adding [OpenXRMlMarkerDetector] nodes to the scene tree. This node instantiates a scene to represent the virtual objects located at those markers. Each instantiated scene will be added as a child of an [XRAnchor3D] node that will be positioned using tracking data from the headset.

method.name: hide
method.description: Hides all markers tracked by this manager.

method.name: show
method.description: Shows all markers tracked by this manager.

members.member: The scene to be instantiated automatically for each marker.
The method that will be called on scenes after they have been instantiated for a marker. The method will be called with a single [OpenXRMlMarkerTracker] argument, representing the marker.
Controls the visibility of the [XRAnchor3D] nodes managed by this node.
